5#ifndef CYD_UI_COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTES_H
6#define CYD_UI_COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTES_H
7
8#include "dimensions.hpp"
9
10struct attribute_i { };
11
12#define COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTE(TYPE, NAME, DEFAULT) \
13 template<typename E> \
14 struct attr_##NAME: public attribute_i { \
15 inline E &NAME(auto& _##NAME##_) { \
16 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
17 return *(E*)this; \
18 } \
19 inline E &NAME(auto&& _##NAME##_) { \
20 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
21 return *(E*)this; \
22 } \
23 TYPE _##NAME = DEFAULT; \
24 }
25
26#define COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTE_W_MONITOR(TYPE, NAME, DEFAULT) \
27 template<typename E> \
28 struct attr_##NAME: public attribute_i { \
29 inline E &NAME(auto& _##NAME##_) { \
30 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
31 this->_##NAME##_has_changed = true; \
32 return *(E*)this; \
33 } \
34 inline E &NAME(auto&& _##NAME##_) { \
35 this->_##NAME = _##NAME##_; \
36 this->_##NAME##_has_changed = true; \
37 return *(E*)this; \
38 } \
39 TYPE _##NAME = DEFAULT; \
40 bool _##NAME##_has_changed = false; \
41 }
42
43COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTE(cydui::dimensions::dimension_t, x, 0);
44COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTE(cydui::dimensions::dimension_t, y, 0);
45COMPONENT_ATTRIBUTE_W_MONITOR(cydui::dimensions::dimension_t, w, 0);

57
58using content = std::vector<cydui::components::component_holder_t>;
59
60template<typename E>
61struct attr_content: public attribute_i {
62 inline E &operator()(auto &&_content_) {
63 this->_content = _content_;
64 return *(E*) this;
65 }
66 inline E &operator()(auto &_content_) {
67 this->_content = _content_;
68 return *(E*) this;
69 }
70 std::function<content()> _content = [] -> content {return {};};
71};
72
73template<typename T>
74struct attrs_margin
75 : attr_margin_top<T>,
76 attr_margin_bottom<T>,
77 attr_margin_left<T>,
78 attr_margin_right<T> {
79};
80
81template<typename T>
82struct attrs_padding
83 : attr_padding_top<T>,
84 attr_padding_bottom<T>,
85 attr_padding_left<T>,
86 attr_padding_right<T> {
87};
88
89template<typename T>
90struct attrs_dimensions
91 : attr_x<T>,
92 attr_y<T>,
93 attr_w<T>,
94 attr_h<T> {
95};
96
97template<typename T>
98struct attrs_component
99 : attrs_dimensions<T>,
100 attrs_margin<T>,
101 attrs_padding<T>,
102 attr_content<T> {
103};
